sourcesContent:
<template>

  <!-- Container which will hold the tree structure -->
  <v-container class="searchContainer">
    <!-- Center the diagram -->
    <v-layout justify-center>
      <TreeChart :json="data" />
    </v-layout>
  </v-container>

</template>

<script>
// Import axios since using API and TreeChart so we can generate the trees
import TreeChart from 'vue-tree-chart'
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  name: 'TreeView',
  components: {
    TreeChart
  },
  data () {
    return {
      data: {}
    }
  },
  // Probably going to have to change this to a method once fully implemented
  created () {
    axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/DataRetrieval/CSCA08H3')
      .then(response => {
        // Since Treechart accepts json just assign it straight
        this.data = (response.data)
      })
      // Catch any errors
      .catch(e => {
        this.errors.push(e)
      })
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .searchContainer{
    top: 50%;
    right: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  }

</style>
